name: nyc.scatter.depthkit.core
description:
Use the Depthkit Core Package to render Depthkit captures from Depthkit Core and Depthkit Cinema in Unityâ€™s Built-in Render Pipeline.

Note that you can only render single-perspective captures with the Depthkit Core package suite. For multi-perspective captures, use Depthkit Studio package suite.

samples.description: Integration for Renderhead's AV Pro v1.x Video Player. (Must Have AVProVideo 1.x imported!).  This version of AVPro is deprecated. To use this script, you must add DK_AVPROv1 as a macro define in player settings.
Prefabs for the Built-in Render Pipeline
